metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3440 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.11 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to affect availability via vectors related to Server: Optimizer.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
